alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Northwest Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 26 at 11:46AM MDT until July 26 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Temperatures up to 102 expected across the Northwest Plateau, including Farmington. Temperatures up to 104 expected across the middle Rio Grande Valley, including Albuquerque. Temperatures up to 106 across the Chaves County Plains, including Roswell. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, Northwest Plateau, and Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Northwest Plateau
